original: Immortal Age is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Practical Age is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Click to increase campaign funds by 10. SHIFT-click to increase by 100. CTRL-click to increase by enough to beat the best candidate, or by 100 if your candidate is the best candidate.
translation: 点击一次增加10的竞选资金。按住SHIFT点击则增加100。按住CTRL点击则增加足以击败最强候选人的资金，如果你的候选人是最强候选人则增加100。

original: Click to decrease campaign funds by 10. SHIFT-click to decrease by 100. CTRL-click to remove the funds entirely.
translation: 点击一次减少10的竞选资金。按住SHIFT点击则减少100。按住CTRL点击则完全移除资金。

original: I have read and understood the Privacy Policy
translation: 我已阅读并知晓隐私协议

original: §RYou must read and accept the Terms of Use to create an account§!
translation: §R你必须阅读并接受使用条款以创建账号§!

original: §RYou must have seen the Privacy Policy to create an account§!
translation: §R创建账号前必须阅读隐私协议§!

original: Decline
Confirm
* Tributary relationship might break when either party becomes part of a different realm
translation: * 当任一方被并入他人领地时，朝贡关系可能破裂。

original: §YCouncil§!
Needs to be approved by your Regent

It has come to my attention that the [From.GetJobTitle] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledName], has bribed and threatened [From.GetHerHis] way through my domain trying to get enough people to recognize a claim on my title that [From.GetSheHe] has fabricated for [From.GetHerHis] liege, [From.Liege.GetTitledName].
translation: 我注意到[From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]已通过贿赂与威胁在我的领地内打通了[From.GetHerHis]门路以图获得足够的人数来认可对我的头衔的宣称权，这是[From.GetSheHe]为[From.GetHerHis]领主[From.Liege.GetTitledName]所伪造的。

original: Disappeared: $DATE|Y$ at age $AGE|Y$
becomes the new §YRegent§! of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
is thrown into a dark cell.
A small enclave established by traders from all over the region in order to conduct trade.
translation: 来自这片区域内各个地方的商人建立了一座小商栈以进行贸易。

original: [k_france.GetName] changes name to France.
[k_germany.GetName] changes name to Germany.
Your close family members might follow you in your conversion.
translation: 你的家庭近亲或许会跟随你改宗。

original: My Teacher

At long last, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest to find a powerful artifact. Holding an ancient wooden chest, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] appears before you and, bowing, offers it to you. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I have searched far and wide, and have found you the Ark of the Covenant itself!'

 The curious chest is decorated with a host of golden angels and ancient glyphs. 

According to legends, within it rest the original tablets of stone holding the Ten Commandments given by Yahweh to Moses on Mount Sinai.

Seemingly expecting for you to speak, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits patiently before you.
translation:
终于，[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]完成[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]找寻强力宝物的任务回到家乡。手持一件古老的木箱，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]出现在你面前，鞠躬将其献上。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我找遍辽远之地，为你寻获约柜的本体！」

这件令人好奇的箱子上装饰着黄金铸就的天使军队和远古的象形文字。

根据传说，其内安放着记述十诫的原初石板，由雅威于西奈山上赐予梅瑟。

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在你面前耐心地等待，似乎盼望着你发话。

original: The Ark of the Covenant
Tribal Levy Size

As the welcoming feast ends, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] and I retreat to finish our conversation in private, observing the moon from the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] walls. Suddenly, bright lights streak across the sky, and the [From.GetJobTitle]'s visage turns ashen. 'Bad omen,' [From.GetSheHe] mutters, before making a hasty departure.
translation: 欢迎宴会结束，[From.GetDynName][From.GetJobTitle]与我退避至私密处继续谈话，在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding]的高墙后赏月。突然，数道亮光划过天空，[From.GetJobTitle]的面容变得苍白。「恶兆，」[From.GetSheHe]嘟囔道，匆匆离开。

original: As I am walking in the gardens with my guest [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] I comment on the sunny skies. After a moment of thought, [From.GetDynName] replies with ardent enthusiasm. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks my pleasantries are a metaphor for the enlightened nature of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]!
translation: 我与宾客[From.GetDynName][From.GetJobTitle]在园林中散步，我评论了几句艳阳天。思虑之后，[From.GetDynName]热切地应和我。看起来[From.GetSheHe]认为我的寒暄是暗喻天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的开明本性！

original: Order the cheaper set of crown jewels.
translation: 订购较便宜的一套御宝。

original: Proper craftsmanship is enough for me.
translation: 适度的工艺对我就足够了。

original: Order a set of crown jewels befitting my status.
translation: 订购一套符合我身份的御宝。

original: Order a beautiful set of crown jewels.
I will order an impressive set of jewels.
translation: 我要订购一套令人赞叹的御宝。

original: Thorough craftsmanship and expensive materials is the key to beauty.
translation: 精雕细琢的工艺与昂贵的材料是美的关键。

original: Craft me something effective yet inexpensive, [From.GetMasterMistressCap].
translation: 为我打造有效又不贵的东西，大师。

original: Craft me something of high quality, that I can bring with me to combat.
translation: 为我打造高品质的武器，我要带上战场。

original: Order the cheapest [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§! slightly.
translation: 订购最便宜的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]将轻微增加你的§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order the cheaper [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§! somewhat.
translation: 订购较便宜的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]将一定程度上增加你的§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订购[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]将增加你的§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order a good quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMorale Offense§!, §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订购优质的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]会增强你的§Y士气打击§!，§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order a high quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will greatly increase your §YMorale Offense§!, §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订购高品质的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]会大幅增强你的§Y士气打击§!，§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Craft me the best quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you can.
translation: 为我制作你能力范围内最高质量的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。

original: Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will drastically increase your §YMoral Offense§!, §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat skill§!.
translation: 订购最高品质的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]会极大增强你的§Y士气打击§!，§Y每月威望§!，§Y军事§!和§Y个人实战能力§!。

original: A heavy box has been brought before me. [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. I am excited to see what the handiwork of [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 一口沉重的箱子呈上我面前。[From.GetFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]工作，御宝已完成。我兴奋地想要看看[From.GetFirstName]的手工技术。

original: A heavy box has been brought before me. [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. I expect something properly befitting my title as [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and I am excited to see [From.GetHerHis] handiwork.
translation: 一口沉重的箱子呈上我面前。[From.GetFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]工作，御宝已完成。我期待真正符合我作为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[Root.GetTitle]头衔地位的东西，我也兴奋地想要看看[From.GetHerHis]手工技术。

original: 'A [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. I see. An excellent choice, my [Root.GetTitle]' says [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] and calls forward an assistant cradling several [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]s in [From.GetHerHis] arms. 'I have a couple of examples here. One must determine what one need and how much one is willing to pay, though they would all serve your Highness well.'
translation: 「[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，我明白了。很好的选择，我的[Root.GetTitle]」[From.GetFirstName]大师说道，叫来一名助手，[From.GetHerHis]怀中抱着数件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。「我这里有好几件样品。一个人必须确定自己需要什么，愿意付出多少，不过它们都将出色地服务于你的高贵地位。」

original: [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. It is an elegant though simple design, and it looks like a fine quality weapon I can bring to war.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师的首要助手将完成的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]呈现给我。武器的设计优雅而简洁，看来我可以带着这件优质武器上战场。

original: [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has finally brought me the finished [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] I have been waiting for. It is a beautiful and elegant [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon], and I am excited to see it goes beyond my original expectations.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师的首要助手将完成的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]呈现给我，我是期待已久了。这是件美丽而优雅的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，我很兴奋地看到其超出我原有的期望。

original: 'Good news, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said excitedly. The [GetWeaponArmorSmith] has informed me that precious metals and special tools have been located in a nearby province. If we send an expedition, it could increase the quality of the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] we are currently crafting.
translation: 「好消息，我的[Root.GetTitle]，」[From.GetFirstName]兴奋地说道。[GetWeaponArmorSmith]告知我珍贵金属和特殊工具就位于一处临近省份。如果我们派出一支探险队，可能增加我们当前正在制作的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]的品质。

original: I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [From.GetHerHis] arms, and as [From.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]即将完工，我被神经质般的兴奋情绪占据。今天我在宝座室接见大师。[From.GetHerHis]双臂中有一个结实的箱子，[From.GetSheHe]打开箱盖，我发觉自己几乎无法呼吸。「你要给她取什么名字，我的[Root.GetTitle]？」

original: I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. As [From.GetSheHe] unveils the armor rack, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]即将完工，我被神经质般的兴奋情绪占据。今天我在宝座室接见大师。[From.GetSheHe]显露出放置盔甲的架子，我发觉自己几乎无法呼吸。「你要给她取什么名字，我的[Root.GetTitle]？」

original: Dragonseeker
Heaven's Vengeance
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s Fury
Golden Vengeance
Scimitar of the Night
Scimitar of Death
Ascalon
Bleeding Lance
Death Strike
The Dragon Cleaver
Heaven's Devastator
Darkbringer
Skullcrusher
Twilight's Hammer
Giant Shatterer
Death Wind
Lightning Strike
Ice Eagle
Angelic Guardian
Green Armor
Immortal
A legendary blade said to rip through the flesh of Dragons.
translation: 传说中的利刃，据说能撕裂龙的血肉。

original: A legendary blade said to be the very embodiment of Heaven's anger.
translation: 传说中的利刃，据说是天怒的具象。

original: A legendary blade said to be crafted with the fury of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 传说中的利刃，据说是用[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的怒火锻造的。

original: A legendary scimitar crafted out of gold.
translation: 传说中的弯刀，以黄金打造。

original: A legendary scimitar rumored to be infused with all the souls of those who have died during the night.
translation: 传说中的弯刀，传言其中充满了暗夜里死去的所有亡灵。

original: A legendary scimitar rumored to be the embodiment of death.
translation: 传说中的弯刀，传言是死亡的化身。

original: Said to be the re-crafted legendary spear of St. George.
translation: 据说是由传说中圣乔治之枪重新打造。

original: A legendary spear that is said to bleed like the Messiah it once pierced.
translation: 传说中的长枪，据说如同其曾刺穿的默西亚一般会流出鲜血。

original: A legendary spear rumored to be able to pierce any material no matter how strong.
translation: 传说中的长枪，传言能刺穿最坚固的物质。

original: A legendary ax said to have cleaved through countless dragons.
translation: 传说中的斧头，据说曾劈开无数的巨龙。

original: A legendary ax rumored to have been wielded by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s messengers.
translation: 传说中的斧头，传言曾由[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的使者挥舞。

original: A legendary ax rumored to be infused by the very essence of night.
translation: 传说中的斧头，传言注入了黑夜的精华。

original: A legendary mace said to have crushed an innumerable amount of foes.
translation: 传说中的钉锤，据说碾碎了难以计数的敌人。

original: A legendary mace said to be infused by the very essence of night.
translation: 传说中的钉锤，据说注入了黑夜的精华。

original: A legendary mace said to be crafted out of the bones of giants.
translation: 传说中的钉锤，据说以巨人们的骨骼打造。

original: A legendary bow said to be infused with the souls of the dead.
translation: 传说中的弓，据说注入了死者的灵魂。

original: A legendary bow said to be crafted in the middle of a storm, and infused with its very essence.
translation: 传说中的弓，据说在暴风的中心打造，并注入了其内的精华。

original: A legendary bow said to have been crafted out of the bones a mythical eagle.
translation: 传说中的弓，据说以神话之鹰的骨头打造。

original: A legendary armor rumored to be worn by the Angels.
translation: 传说中的盔甲，传言是供天使穿戴的。

original: A legendary armor said to be worn by the Green Knight of Arthurian legends.
translation: 传说中的盔甲，据说是亚瑟王传奇中的绿骑士所穿。

original: A legendary armor said to be indestructible by any mortal means.
translation: 传说中的盔甲，据说凡人的任何手段皆无法损伤。

original: This sword will be known as Dragonseeker!
translation: 这把剑将以猎龙剑之名闻名于世！

original: Golden Vengeance!
This lance will be known as Ascalon!
translation: 这杆长枪将被称为亚实基伦！

original: This ax will be known as The Dragon Cleaver!
translation: 这把斧将以斩龙斧之名闻名于世！

original: The Skullcrusher!
This bow will be known as Death Wind!
translation: 这把弓将以死亡之风之名闻名于世！

original: This armor will be my Angelic Guardian.
translation: 这件盔甲将是我的天使守护甲。

original: My every foe shall fear Heaven's Vengeance!
translation: 我的敌人要害怕我的天罚了！

original: Scimitar of the Night is a fitting name, no?
translation: 暗夜弯刀是个不错的名字，对吧？

original: My every foe shall fear Bleeding Lance!
translation: 我的仇人得害怕滴血之枪了！

original: My every foe shall fear Heaven's Devastator!
translation: 我的仇人得害怕天灾了！

original: My every foe shall fear The Twilights Hammer!
translation: 我的仇人得害怕暮光之锤了！

original: My every foe shall fear Lightning Strike!
translation: 我的仇人得害怕雷击之弓了！

original: This will be my Green Armor.
She looks like a [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s Fury, doesn't she?
Scimitar of Death.
Death Strike is a fitting name, no?
translation: 必死之刺是不错的名字，对吧？

original: She looks like a Darkbringer, doesn't she?
translation: 她就像是黑暗使者，是吧？

original: The Giant Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
translation: 巨人破碎锤是个不错的名字，对吧？

original: She looks like an Ice Eagle, doesn't she?
translation: 她就像是寒冰之鹰，是吗？

original: Everyone shall fear the Immortal.
translation: 每个人都会害怕不朽甲。

original: The Crown of Majesty
Emerald Scepter
Sword of Heroes
Dagger of Glory
Ruby Bracelets
Celestial Necklace
Heavenly Circlet
Staff of Majesty
Crown of Crows
Hero's Crown
Axe of the Ancestors

I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [From.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [From.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...
translation: 我难以克制兴奋与好奇的情绪，因为[From.GetFirstName]告知我御宝已完成！我坐在宝座上等待[From.GetHerHis]仆人们将大箱子抬过房间，努力不跳起来中途截住他们。我终于碰到那沉重的箱盖，双手忍不住颤抖……

original: 'Good news, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said excitedly. The goldsmith has informed me that precious metals and gemstones have been located in a nearby province. If we send an expedition, it could increase the quality of the crown jewels we are currently crafting.
translation: 「好消息，我的[Root.GetTitle]，」[From.GetFirstName]兴奋地说道。金匠告知我珍贵金属与宝石就位于一处临近省份。如果我们派遣一支探险队，有可能增加当前正在打御宝的品质。

original: Spend money to potentially get even better crown jewels than you originally ordered.
translation: 花钱有可能获得比你原先订购的更好的御宝。

original: Settle with the crown jewels you originally ordered.
translation: 满足于你原先订购的御宝。

original: Spend money to potentially get even better crown jewels than you originally ordered.
translation: 花钱有可能获得比你原先订购的更好的御宝。

original: Settle with the crown jewels you originally ordered.
translation: 满足于你原先订购的御宝。

original: Spend money to potentially get an even better [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] than the one you originally ordered.
translation: 花钱有可能获得比你原先订购的更好的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。

original: Settle with the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you originally ordered.
Spend money to potentially get an even better [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] than the one you originally ordered.
translation: 花钱有可能获得比你原先订购的更好的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。

original: Settle with the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you originally ordered.
[GetWeaponName]
A well crafted [Root.GetWeaponType] made at the behest of [Root.GetTitledName] by [From.GetTitledName].
translation: 制作优良的[Root.GetWeaponType]，根据[Root.GetTitledName]的指示由[From.GetTitledName]打造。

original: An excellently crafted [Root.GetWeaponType] made at the behest of [Root.GetTitledName] by [From.GetTitledName]
translation: 制作精良的[Root.GetWeaponType]，根据[Root.GetTitledName]的指示由[From.GetTitledName]打造

You finally receive your long awaited sword.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的剑。

original: You finally receive your long awaited scimitar.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的弯刀。

original: You finally receive your long awaited lance.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的长枪。

original: You finally receive your long awaited ax.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的斧头。

original: You finally receive your long awaited mace.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的钉锤。

original: You finally receive your long awaited BOW.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的弓。

original: You finally receive your long awaited sword.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的剑。

original: You finally receive your long awaited scimitar.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的弯刀。

original: You finally receive your long awaited lance.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的骑枪。

original: You finally receive your long awaited ax.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的斧头。

original: You finally receive your long awaited mace.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的钉锤。

original: You finally receive your long awaited BOW.
translation: 你终于得到了期待已久的弓。

original: The pillaging and looting undertaken in your name has earned you a reputation as a fearsome Viking raider. All along the coasts, mothers tucking their children in for the night warn that unless they behave, the terrible [Root.GetFirstName], scourge of the seas, will come ashore with [Root.GetHerHis] undead warriors and eat them.
translation: 在你旗号下的劫掠使你赢得了令人惧怕的维京海盗这一名号。漫漫海岸线上，母亲以你的名字吓唬着他们不守规矩的孩子：再这样捣蛋，可怕的[Root.GetFirstName]，诸海之天谴，会和[Root.GetHerHis]不死战士一起上岸把你吃了。

original: You are known as [GetFirstName] the [GetSeaQueenKing], for you can take whatever you want anywhere that the wild waves beat on rock or sand. No [Root.GetManWoman] sails a ship better, no [Root.GetManWoman] fights more fiercely, no [Root.GetManWoman] is held in more fear.
translation: 人们皆称你为[GetSeaQueenKing][GetFirstName]，因你能从任何地方拿走任何东西，只要那里惊涛拍岸。无人比[Root.GetManWoman]更会驾船，无人比[Root.GetManWoman]更英勇善战，无人能比[Root.GetManWoman]带来更多恐惧。

original: Sea Queen
Sea King
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes §Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]§!.
Disable the hint.
Silvio
Mastropiero
Tiepolo
Kastriotis
Skleros
Monomachos
Kourkoas
Euferbenos
Scarponnois
Rajasthan
Recently Invited an Ascetic
translation: 最近邀请了一位苦行者

original: Horde troops will be disbanded. You  gain troops proportional to land you're abandoning on the steppe.\n
translation: 游牧部队将被解散。你获得与你放弃的草原土地成比例的军队。\n

original: Due to population, additional provinces may be converted to §Y[From.Culture.GetName]§! culture and the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! faith.\n
translation: 鉴于人口数量，可能有额外省份转变为§Y[From.Culture.GetName]§!文化和§Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!信仰。\n

original: Become a Feudal ruler.
§Y*§! Can raise Runestones up until the year 1150.
translation: §Y*§! 直到1150年前可以树立符文石。

original: §Y*§! Can Blind prisoners.\n§Y*§! Can Castrate prisoners.
translation: §Y*§! 可以致盲囚犯。\n§Y*§! 可以阉割囚犯。

original: §Y*§! Can become Genghis Khan.
§Y*§! Has access to the Tanistry succession law.
translation: §Y*§! 可用凯尔特选任继承法。

original: §Y*§! Crown Laws can only be passed by Kings and Emperors.\n§Y*§! They concern everyone in the DeJure Kingdom or Empire.\n§Y*§! If a DeJure Kingdom or Empire does not exist, the DeFacto Kingdom or Empire Crown Laws will take precedence.
translation: §Y*§! 只有国王和皇帝能通过王权法。\n§Y*§! 王权法涉及法理王国和帝国内的每个人。\n§Y*§! 如果法理王国或帝国不存在，实际王国或帝国的王权法将优先生效。

original: Despite their similarities, the Indian religions also have their distinct differences. Jain rulers build the most stable realms, but are the least aggressive and have no Holy Wars. Hinduism is the most warlike of them, but have a caste system which restricts their status and relationships. Finally, the Buddhist faith gives a large bonus to technological advancement.
translation: 尽管有相似之处，印度诸教也有各自的明确差异。耆那教统治者能建设最稳定的领地，但最没有侵略性，也没有圣战。印度教最好战，但也有种性制度束缚其地位和关系。最后，佛教信仰对于科技进步有大幅增益。

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Invasion of the [offmap_china.GetFullName]
the Hawk of Quarysh

On succession, Weak Claims are given to children who are not second or third in the line of succession. Weak Claims can only be pressed against:
§Y* Female Rulers 
  * Current title holder doesn't have Full Status for women
  * The claimant is male, or either gender if the claimant have Full Status for women
* Regencies
* Titles already being contested in a Claim or Succession War
* Titles the claimant is second or third in line to inherit§!
translation:
继承时，第三继承顺位之后的子女才会获得弱宣称。弱宣称只能在以下情形中使用：
§Y* 女性统治者 
  * 当前头衔持有者没有完整女性地位
  * 宣称者是男性，如果宣称者有完整女性地位则可以是任意性别。
* 摄政期
* 头衔已处于宣称战争或继承战争的争夺之中
* 头衔宣称者是第二或第三顺位继承人§!

original: An [altaic.GetGroupName] Culture besides [jurchen.GetName]
I have grown closer to [From.GetFirstName].
You may give the order to permanently blind §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. This is a common Byzantine way of dealing with political rivals without outright killing them.
translation: 你可以下令永久致盲§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!。这是拜占庭以不直接杀人的方式来对付政敌的常见做法。

original: A 25% chance to become §YCruel§!
The §YSee the Realm Prosper§! ambition will conclude when this modifier expires.\nWhile this ambition is active, §YGlobal Revolt Risk§! is reduced by 1%.
translation: §Y见证领地繁荣§!的野心将会在此修正消失时达成。\n此野心启用期间，§Y全局叛乱风险§!降低1%。

original: You can imprison subjects without incurring tyranny. Note that an empowered council might still object.\n$LIST$
translation: 你能逮捕以下臣民而不会引起暴政的恶名。注意，获授权的内阁仍有可能反对。\n$LIST$

original: You have no Allies that are possible to call to War
translation: 你没有能召唤参战的盟友

original: You have no Vassals that are possible to call to War
translation: 你没有能召唤参战的封臣

original: $COMPARISON$ $PERCENT|Y$% ($VALUE|Y$) of counties of $REGION|Y$:
§RNOT Able to Loot§!
This Province can potentially be looted for §Y$LOOT$§!¤ every §Y$DAYS$§! days. This is split between all looting units.
translation: 这个省份每 §Y$DAYS$§! 天可以被掠夺 §Y$LOOT$§!¤。这些钱将会由所有正在掠夺的单位平分。

original: $CHILD|Y$ cannot be in prison
§RWill cause all embarked troops to disband.§!
translation: §R将导致所有已上船的部队被解散。§!

original: \nNo special event fleets will be disbanded.
\n§RAll special event fleets will be disbanded!§!
translation: \n§R所有特殊事件舰队将被解散！§!

original: $PERC$: $PERSON|Y$ controls all the claimed titles
You cannot create a title that has been marked as Inactive
translation: 你不能创建已标记为失效的头衔

original: $GENDER_RULE$ $SUCCESSION_LAW$
You can only Designate that could potentially be in the line of succession
translation: 你只能指定有可能列入继承顺序中的角色

original: Holding Garrison is $COMPARISON|Y$ $PERC|Y%0$
Holding Raisable Levy is $COMPARISON|Y$ $PERC|Y%0$
Holding Total Levy is $COMPARISON|Y$ $PERC|Y%0$

[offmap_china.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] must be displeased with the Dragon Throne, for a great Mongol Horde has managed to cross the mighty fortifications of Northern China, intent on disrupting the harmony and prosperity of the 'Divine Land'. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName] is mustering [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] armies in [GetRandomChineseRegion] for a swift response, but [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] could be in for a long war...\n\nFor tributary states of China this means that their suzerain will be unable to lend them military aid. Others point out that it is an opportune time to break free.
translation: [offmap_china.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]一定是对真龙天子感到不满。因为一支伟大的蒙古游牧军设法击穿了中国北部的严密防御体系，意图破乱「神州」的和谐与繁荣。[offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]对此迅速做出反应，正在[GetRandomChineseRegion]召集[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]军队，但[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun]或许还是会陷入战争的泥淖……\n\n对于中国的朝贡国而言，这意味着他们的宗主国现在无力提供军事援助。也有人指出这是挣脱并获得自由的时机。

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] must have decided to punish the arrogance of the bureaucratic Chinese regime, for a great Jurchen Horde has recently disrupted the harmony of the 'Divine Land'. Led by their great Khagan, numberless fierce riders have crossed the Liao river and invaded Northeastern China, apparently intent on conquering the whole empire. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] is slowly gathering [FromFrom.Ruler.GetPossPronoun] forces in [GetRandomChineseRegion], but many are already questioning whether [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] has lost the Mandate of Heaven...\n\nFor tributary states of China this means that their suzerain will be unable to lend them military aid. Others point out that it is an opportune time to break free.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]定然已决意惩罚中国官僚体制的桀骜不驯，因为一支伟大的女真游牧军最近破乱了「神州」的和谐。在他们伟大可汗的带领下，不可胜数凶残的骑手跨过了辽河，入侵中国东北，显然意图征服整个帝国。[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]正在[GetRandomChineseRegion]缓慢地收拢着[FromFrom.Ruler.GetPossPronoun]部队，但许多人已开始怀疑[FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun]失去了天命……\n\n对于中国的朝贡国而言，这意味着他们的宗主国现在无力提供军事援助。也有人指出这是挣脱并获得自由的时机。

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gets 'Angered China' for 50 years, decreasing Monthly Prestige by §R-0.50§! and Monthly Grace by §R-2§!.
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]获得「中国被激怒」，持续50年，降低每月威望 §R-0.50§! 和每月皇恩 §R-2§!。

original: But I am not ready to commit to a pastime so whole-heartedly...
translation: 但我不打算全身心投入到一项消遣活动中去……

original: Tribes are settled, but agrarian. Each County can only have one Tribal 'Holding', representing the entire local tribal population - the more empty Holding slots, the more powerful the Tribal Holding. Tribal rulers are most often seen using the 'Elective Gavelkind' Succession Law, which tends to fragment the realm between sons on the death of the chief.
translation: 部落定居且务农。每个省份只能有一个部落「地产」，代表当地所有部落人口——空地产格越多，部落地产越强。部落统治者通常使用「选举均分」继承法，容易令领地在酋长死后被诸子分割。

original: Well done, [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle] [corresponding_councilor.GetFirstName].
My guests have arrived for the private feast I have arranged. It's time to let the carousing and merriment begin!
translation: 客人们已经莅临我安排的这场私人宴会。是时候开始痛饮和狂欢了！

original: I have arrived at the private rooms of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. There is plenty of food and drink here, and the mood is decidedly merry. I am looking forward to this!
translation: 我来到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的私人房间。这里摆满了美酒佳肴，而且气氛绝对欢乐。这回没白来！

original: Late into the third day of feasting, I sit awake, alone, contemplating the revelries. Next to me on a couch lies one of my companions, sleeping a deep drunken sleep, defenseless and beautiful, skin glowing in the candlelight.
translation: 宴会的第三天晚上，我独坐着，神志清醒，注视着狂欢宴饮。旁边的卧榻上躺着一位深深醉倒的同伴，既美丽而又毫无抵抗力，在烛光之下显得白肌胜雪而又面色红润。

original: Several days of feasting together, and I have many times caught [From.GetFirstName] looking at me in that 'special' way. Finally, after a late cup of wine, [From.GetSheHe] puts [From.GetHerHis] arms around me and whispers a delicious proposal in my ear...
translation: 几日群聚宴会过后，我好几次遇到[From.GetFirstName]用那种「特殊」的眼神看着我。终于在酒过三巡后，[From.GetSheHe]用[From.GetHerHis]手臂抱住了我，并在耳边轻声提出一个甜蜜的建议……

original: [From.GetFirstName] acceded to my advances, and we spend the rest of the night together, enjoying each other...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]同意了我的提议，在当晚剩余的时间里我们缠绵在了一起，享受着彼此……

original: [From.GetFirstName] declined my amorous advances. I excuse myself, then return to the pleasures of the table. Soon, the embarrassing moment is forgotten... almost.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]拒绝了我性爱的提议。我为自己辩解了一番，就又回桌前吃喝去了。不久，这个尴尬的瞬间就几乎……被遗忘了。

original: These days of revelry are an excellent escape. So many laughs and so many intense conversations in such short a time... It brings me closer to my companions, I feel like good friends already.
translation: 这些天的狂欢让我忘却了尘世的烦恼。在短暂的时间里我们有过数不尽的欢声笑语……这让我和我的同伴们之间的联系更为紧密，我感到我们已经是好朋友了。

original: Is it the drink? Is it something someone said? I don't remember, honestly, but someone has to pay! Fight!
translation: 是酒劲来了么？是不是谁说了什么话？老实说，我什么都不记得了，但有人必须付出代价！开打！

original: Good drinks and food, carousing, everything is fine. Or was fine, until [From.GetTitledFirstName] unexpectedly threw a fit of rage. I'm not sure why, but [From.GetSheHe]'s coming at me right now with [From.GetHerHis] fists up.
translation: 美酒和佳肴，还有狂欢痛饮，一切是那么祥和。或者说之前是这样，直到[From.GetTitledFirstName]毫无征兆地暴怒起来。我不知道这是为什么，但是[From.GetSheHe]正举起[From.GetHerHis]拳头往你这边走来。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] put up a good fight, in spite of being just as inebriated as I. After a while we were both exhausted and had to call it a draw.
translation: 尽管和我一样喝的酩酊大醉，[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是打得有声有色。没过多久我们就筋疲力竭了，都认为算是打了个平手。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] started speaking to me calmly, explaining that there was no need to be upset. I considered it for a moment, and then realized that [From.GetSheHe] was right. We ended up sitting down to eat and drink together again.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]开始温和地向我阐述根本无需动怒。我想了一会，然后意识到[From.GetSheHe]是对的。于是我们最后又坐下来吃肉喝酒了

original: At the last moment, [From.GetSheHe] ran out, after throwing a chair at me and making me stumble. I searched everywhere but couldn't find [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 在最后关头，[From.GetSheHe]扔过来了一把椅子绊了我一下，然后逃了出去。我四下寻找就是找不到[From.GetHerHim]。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is feasting and reveling like a lunatic. I can hardly stand up, I am laughing so hard.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]吃喝狂欢得跟个疯子一样。我笑的都快站不起来了。

original: It's great to spend time carousing and frolicking in good company. I feel great, absolutely great, and that means the time has come to bring out the old game board.
translation: 跟一群好友畅饮宴游实在太棒了。我很爽，绝对爽，而这意味着是时候拿出那块旧棋盘了。

original: It's great to spend time carousing in merry company. While the cups are being refilled, [From.GetTitledFirstName] brings out a strange board with little decorated pieces, explaining that it's a kind of strategy game. [From.GetSheHeCap] assures me that it's a great pastime that combines well with copious amounts of drink.
translation: 跟一群妙人们畅饮狂欢太棒了。当酒杯被再次加满时。[From.GetTitledFirstName]拿出了一块奇怪的棋盘，带着一些精美的棋子，介绍说这是一种战略游戏。[From.GetSheHe]保证说一边喝个痛快一边玩这个会是个不错的消遣。

original: I suggested to [From.GetTitledFirstName] that we bring out the board and pieces to play and see who is the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] has accepted, on the condition that we play for money.
translation: 我对[From.GetTitledFirstName]提议我们拿出棋盘和棋子游玩，看看谁在战略上更胜一筹。在赌钱的情况下，[From.GetSheHe]同意了。

original: I suggested to [From.GetTitledFirstName] that we bring out the board and pieces to play and see who's the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] accepted, insisting that we play for honor.
translation: 我对[From.GetTitledFirstName]提议我们拿出棋盘和棋子游玩，看看谁在战略上更胜一筹。[From.GetSheHe]同意了，但是坚持我们只为了荣誉而玩。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought out the board and pieces and suggests that we play a few rounds to determine who is the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that we play for money.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拿出了棋盘和棋子，提议说来玩几局看看谁在战略上更胜一筹。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持我们要赌钱。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought out the board and pieces and suggests that we play a few rounds to determine who is the better strategist. We will play for honor.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拿出了棋盘和棋子，提议说来玩几局看看谁在战略上更胜一筹。我们将为荣誉而玩。

original: We played for hours, the tides of fortune ebbing and flowing as I tried to attack my opponent's positions without opening my defense too much. Eventually, I found a critical opening, made a few inspired and aggressive moves and won the game!
translation: 我们玩了几个小时，我试图在不暴露自身防御破绽的同时攻击对手，幸运的潮水有涨有落。终于，我找到了一个致命的破绽，走了灵活又具侵略性的几步棋，赢得了游戏！

original: We played for hours, the tides of fortune ebbing and flowing as I tried to attack my opponent's positions without opening my defense too much. Eventually, however, I made a fatal mistake that my opponent exploited, and I lost the game.
translation: 我们玩了几个小时，我试图在不暴露自身防御破绽的同时攻击对手，幸运的潮水有涨有落。最后，无可奈何地，我犯了一个致命错误，对手利用了这一点，我输掉了游戏。

Mosque
Temple

[Root.Holder.GetHouseOfWorshipCap] Town
True Father

translation: $CHARACTER|Y$设定为不能被这局游戏剪除

translation: 对于$TITLE$没有已索取的强宣称

translation: 对于$TITLE$没有已索取的弱宣称

original: Modulo §Y$VAR$§! by §Y$VALUE$§!
Male Opinion
Female Opinion
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is of a religion that allows demanding religious conversion
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!所属的宗教允许其命令他人皈依

original: The pregnancy of $CHARACTER|Y$ is canceled
Must pay the bride price for marriage with a noblewoman
translation: 与贵族女性结婚必须支付聘金

original: §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! is set free.
§Y[This.GetTitledName]§! is arrested and thrown in jail.
§Y[This.GetTitledName]§! is impressed with my explanation.

Oh, blessed [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. I, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName], have completed a pilgrimage in your name.

I pray you are pleased with me.


– From the journal of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] of [Root.Society.GetName]
translation:
哦，神圣的[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。我，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，以你的名完成了朝圣。

我祈求你因我而喜悦。


——来自[Root.Society.GetName][From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的日记

original: Mother-in-Law
Father-in-Law
Unit is NOT a special event unit, such as an §YOrganized Raid§! summoned by your councilor
translation: 单位不是特殊事件单位，例如由你的阁僚召唤出的§Y有组织劫掠§!

original: The $NAME$ will stand down and ships will return home.
translation: $NAME$将解散，所有船只将安全返乡。

original: Died: $DATE|Y$ at age $AGE|Y$
Went to China: $DATE|Y$ at age $AGE|Y$
Returned to China: $DATE|Y$ at age $AGE|Y$

A merchant approaches the court and carefully pleads to make a payment plan for the recent loan taken by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems the fruits of [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] labor may have been exaggerated, and since the loan was made in your name, this reflect poorly on you too. What will the consequence be for [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]?
translation: 有个商人来到宫廷，小心翼翼地恳求你为[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]的最近一笔贷款给出偿还计划。似乎[target_treasurer.GetHerHis]劳动成果可能被夸大了，而鉴于这笔贷款登记在你的名下，这也有损于你。[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]的结局会如何呢？

original: The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
translation: 这个箍冠由黄金制成，镶嵌着异域名贵的宝石——祖母绿、红宝石、蓝宝石和钻石——最珍贵的几颗都有鹌鹑蛋大小。

original: This scepter is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
translation: 这柄权杖因它上面装饰的翡翠而得名，这些翡翠的数量和品质都不同寻常。它们来源掩藏于神秘之中，而关于它们的故事像星星一样多。

original: This ornamental weapon is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
translation: 这件装饰性武器外观令人印象深刻。剑刃镀金，剑柄装饰着来自异域的宝石，如红宝石和蓝宝石，还有描绘了传说中战士的玛瑙浮雕。

original: This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in swirling patterns along the hilt.
translation: 这把短剑有着镀金的利刃和装饰繁复的握柄，散发着权力的光辉。璀璨夺目的红宝石、石榴石和钻石呈螺旋状镶嵌在握柄上。

original: These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory.
translation: 这些黄金手镯装饰着红宝石和雕刻的象牙片。

original: With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond.
translation: 这条由许多钻石和蓝宝石串成的项链像夜空一样美丽，它的中心是一枚令人叹为观止的蓝色钻石，足有核桃大小。

original: This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires.
translation: 这个壮丽的头环装饰着金色的翅膀和非常大而有光泽的蓝宝石。

original: This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
translation: 这柄沉重的镀金权杖雕刻着古代史诗的场景，并用祖母绿和象牙装饰。

original: This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
translation: 这件金质杰作上饰有金银丝线勾勒的树叶与藤蔓。十几只闪闪发光的鸦鸟顺次栖息于顶部，双眼均由琥珀制成，它们两翅展开，如同即将展翅飞翔一般。

original: The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
translation: 宝冠的基底是一圈沉重的金带，每一个冠峰都被雕成了传说中的战士的形状，中央是一整块闪闪发光的红宝石。

original: This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
translation: 这把镀金斧头上刻着祖先传说的图画。琥珀镶嵌在手柄上。
